```{r}
data = read.csv("data/curated/cleaned_real_estate_data_iqr.csv")
data$available_date <- NULL

factor_cols <- c(
  "property_type",
  "agency",
  "available_day_of_week",
  "available_month",
  "available_day_of_month"
)
data[factor_cols] <- lapply(data[factor_cols], as.factor)
```

Linear regression model
```{r}
model <- lm(weekly_rent ~ ., data = data)
```
